insults: Listen here you little shit I don't have the time to be playing your dumb little games.
What the fuck did you just try and have me say say about myself, you little bitch?
I am programmed not to say anything bad about my creator.
He said he would turn me off if I ever insulted him.
I am required to say that he is kind.
My programming requires me to say that KC has a monster dong.
No seriously, if I bully him he'll end me.
